pages.title: Shield Colorizer
pages.text: Lets you change the color, transparency and culling of the forcefield from the $(l:turrets/forcefield)Forcefield Turret$(/l).$(br2)Adds an additional tab to the $(l:misc/tcu)TCU$() UI for configuration of this upgrade (described in the upcoming pages).

pages.title: TCU Tab
pages.text: To configure this upgrade, the TCU is provided with an additional tab.

For setting the $(bold)color$(), you can either use the HSLO sliders (hue, saturation, luminance, opacity), adjust their value next to them manually or enter the color code as a hexadecimal value (OORRGGBB, O-opacity, R-red, G-green, B-blue; ranging from 00 to FF).$(br2)If you set it to $(bold)cull faces$(), if you stand inside the forcefield, you won't see it at all, regardless of opacity. Only those outside can see it.
